snippet: A sequel to "Bridesmaids" may move forward without Kristen Wiig, its star and co-writer, and instead focus on Melissa McCarthy's character.
abstract: A sequel to "Bridesmaids" may move forward without Kristen Wiig, its star and co-writer, and instead focus on Melissa McCarthy's character.
lead_paragraph: On the heels of all sorts of statuette attention for "Bridesmaids" came word that its blockbuster success - it grossed $288 million worldwide -- might not be repeated: Kristen Wiig and Annie Mumolo were not interested in writing a "Bridesmaids 2."

headline.main: 'Bridesmaids' Rolls Along, but Will It Roll Toward a Sequel Without Kristen Wiig?
